NGUYEN THI THANH MAI 
EXPERIENCE 
PROJECT TEAM Jan 2018 – May 2019 
 Marketing Strategy: market trend, customers insight, brand and 
customer’s demand. 
 Merchandising: OTB by dept., VM guide line, place order fixtures, goods 
and POSM, review sales performance, promotion strategy, control stock 
balance.  
 Negotiating terms and conditions with local suppliers: the contract, 
promotion, return. 
AEON VIETNAM CO., LTD.   
Senior Merchandiser Sep 2017 – Dec 2018 
 Product Strategy of Bedding – Storage – Home Furniture division: 
effectively in terms of pricing, promotion, products assortment, quality of 
products, Product concept, 3C Analysis, Assortment plan, Monthly & 
Quarterly sales plan. Responsible for the total sales & GP merchandise 
performance, Stock. 
 Supplier management, negotiation of payment terms, rebates etc.… 
 Research, analyze and evaluate the market to identify customers’ needs 
and product/range opportunities. Develop a range assortment from 
import and domestic items. 
 Design and implement with Merchandising Plano-grams. 
 Action and Planning Social event to hit sales target. Prepare monthly 
promotion plan - weekly highlight items, advertisement, thematic event,… 
INDEX LIVING MALL VIETNAM - VinDS Trading & Services Co., Ltd 
Senior Merchandiser Feb 2016 – Aug 2017 
Product Strategy and Planning 
 Develop a range assortment, product rationalization & discontinuations.  
 Analyzing every aspect of the bestselling price points, colors or styles. 
 Trade marketing plan/ Mechanic for marketing plan. 
Buying and Trading 
 Manage the OTB and buying process, monitor product costs, gross margin 
and expenses, product pricing. Monitor and analyze inventory, stock turn. 
E-commerce: Adayroi.com – Key Account Manager 
 Plan & Follow up increase key assortment, support product and content 
creation process, maintain constant stock available, competitor pricing, 
weekly promotions, marketing plan. 
DONGHWA CERAMIC CO., LTD. 
Sales Manager Nov 2014 – Feb 2016 
 Category Management: pricing, promotion, products assortment, 
evaluate the effectiveness of sales on costs and benefits, negotiating for 
the best Trading terms. forecasting sell in-out, budget management. 
LOCK&LOCK VIETNAM – HANACOBI VINA CO., LTD. 
Trade Marketing and Key Account Manager Feb 2012 – Oct 2014 
 
Trade Marketing and Planning 
 
Product Selection and Development at MT Channel
